org.exist.memtree
Class InMemoryXMLStreamReader

java.lang.Object
  org.exist.memtree.InMemoryXMLStreamReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
XMLStreamConstants, XMLStreamReader, ExtendedXMLStreamReader
public class InMemoryXMLStreamReader
extends Object
implements ExtendedXMLStreamReader

Implementation of a StAX XMLStreamReader, which wraps around eXist's in-memory DOM. This class complements EmbeddedXMLStreamReader which reads persistent documents.
